channel.title: Adding custom items to Project Insanity/RiotScape?
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if it would be possible to add custom items to Project Insanity source. If so, please tell me how. Thanks.

item.title: Adding custom items to Project Insanity/RiotScape?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

Thanks. Also, I just make the models folder and put them in?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom items to Project Insanity/RiotScape?

item.title: Adding custom items to Project Insanity/RiotScape?
item.dc:creator: @Czar_y2k Czar y2k
item.description:
@Czar_y2k wrote:

yes its possible. add them in the itemdef file.

public String aString170;//name
public byte aByteArray178[];//description
public String aStringArray189[];//actions
public int[] anIntArray156;//originalModelColors
public int[] anIntArray160;//modifiedModelColors
public int anInt174;//modelID
public int anInt165;//maleEquip1 (if galkons refactored client)
public int anInt188;//maleEquip2 (if galkons refactored client)
public int anInt200;//femaleEquip1 (if galkons refactored client)
public int anInt164;//femaleEquip2 (if galkons refactored client)
public int anInt181;//modelZoom
public int anInt190;//modelRotation1
public int anInt198;//modelRotation2
public int anInt169;//modelOffset1
public int anInt194;//modelOffset2

Read full topic
item.source: Adding custom items to Project Insanity/RiotScape?
